name.description: The layer ID this content belongs to, in the `3DTILES_layers` `layers` dictionary.

bufferView.description: Index of a buffer view that indicates whether the layer for each tile in a subtree is available. The bitstream is a 1D boolean array that has an element for each tile. If the layer for a tile is available, its bit is 1, and if it is unavailable, the bit is 0. The number of elements in the array is (N ^ (subtreeDepth + 1) - 1) / (N - 1) where N is 4 for tiling scheme `QUADTREE` and 8 for `OCTREE`.
